text: Héctor Cavallero (October 2, 1939 – October 2, 2020) was an Argentine Socialist politician. He was born in Las Parejas, Santa Fe. He was Mayor of Rosario, Santa Fe from 1989 to 1995. Cavallero was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 1999 to 2003. Cavallero died on his 81st birthday on October 2, 2020 at a hospital from pneumonia-related problems in Rosario.Murió el ex intendente socialista de Rosario Héctor “El Tigre” Cavallero ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Argentine politicians Category:People from Rosario, Argentina
title: Héctor Cavallero
